page.title: 19MAIN ROAD &SIDE ROAD TRAFFIC
page.content: We counted traffic passing along the main Cirencester to Tetbury Road on a Thursday morning in July between 11.30a.m. & noon. At the same time traffic passing through the middle of Rodmarton was counted. {Main road } numbers are given first followed by { {Side road }numbers. Cars 173:9, Vans 21:1, Buses 1:1, coaches 1:0, Lorries 14:0, Tractors 0:1, Pedestrians 0:2, Pedal cyclists 2:0, Motor bikes 1:0, Caravans 4:0, Trailers 2:0. {Total} traffic 119:14. A helicopter & a plane passed over the main road.
